thread.section_title: Mercure Paris Vaugirard Porte de Versailles Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Simple and functional
thread.title_full: Simple and functional - Review of Mercure Paris Vaugirard Porte de Versailles Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Mark_from_Thailand
title: Simple and functional
text:
I stayed here one night, while on business in Paris.
The hotel is a classic Mercure; clean, modern, spacious with few frills. The lobby is pleasant and airy.
Checkin was swift, efficient.
The room was a standard, business style room, spacious, clean with a decent TV.
The room is quiet, I slept well and left early in the morning.
if you want efficiency, cleanliness and safety, with little in the way of charm or warmth, this is the place for you.
